amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to allow for cross agency coordination and collaboration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Dean.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
